nodes.text: Consul-General Skalus was an Imperial official in charge of the Imperial Consulate on the planet Asation.

Skalus was in charge of the Imperial Consulate on the planet Asation in the Gree Enclave during the Galactic Civil War. He hated his position, and kept a low profile. Skalus hoped that by ignoring the sector Imperial Customs office's pleas to gather uncollected tax revenues, he would get demoted and reassigned.
